remarks: The ` N ` -th derivative of ` F ` is continuous.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
etransclem34.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
etransclem34.a $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |`t S ) ) $.
etransclem34.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. NN ) $.
etransclem34.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN0 ) $.
etransclem34.f $e |- F = ( x e. X |-> ( ( x ^ ( P - 1 ) ) x. prod_ k e. ( 1 ... M ) ( ( x - k ) ^ P ) ) ) $.
etransclem34.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
etransclem34.h $e |- H = ( k e. ( 0 ... M ) |-> ( x e. X |-> ( ( x - k ) ^ if ( k = 0 , ( P - 1 ) , P ) ) ) ) $.
etransclem34.c $e |- C = ( n e. NN0 |-> { c e. ( ( 0 ... n ) ^m ( 0 ... M ) ) | sum_ k e. ( 0 ... M ) ( c ` k ) = n } ) $.
etransclem34 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S Dn F ) ` N ) e. ( X -cn-> CC ) ) $.
